verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,

Take <S%H5375><s%> the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>,

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even until fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, all that enter <S%H935><s%> into the host <S%H6635><s%>, to do <S%H6213><s%> the work <S%H4399><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

This shall be the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, about the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>:

And when the camp <S%H4264><s%> setteth forward <S%H5265><s%>, Aaron <S%H175><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%>, and his sons <S%H1121><s%>, and they shall take down <S%H3381><s%> the covering <S%H4539><s%> vail <S%H6532><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> the ark <S%H727><s%> of testimony <S%H5715><s%> with it:

And shall put <S%H5414><s%> thereon the covering <S%H3681><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>, and shall spread <S%H6566><s%> over <S%H4605><s%> it a cloth <S%H899><s%> wholly <S%H3632><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof.

And upon the table <S%H7979><s%> of shewbread <S%H6440><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> thereon the dishes <S%H7086><s%>, and the spoons <S%H3709><s%>, and the bowls <S%H4518><s%>, and covers <S%H7184><s%> to cover withal <S%H5262><s%>: and the continual <S%H8548><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> shall be thereon: cover: or, pour out withal

And they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> upon them a cloth <S%H899><s%> of scarlet <S%H8438><s%> <S%H8144><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> the same with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H7760><s%> in the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof.

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> the candlestick <S%H4501><s%> of the light <S%H3974><s%>, and his lamps <S%H5216><s%>, and his tongs <S%H4457><s%>, and his snuffdishes <S%H4289><s%>, and all the oil <S%H8081><s%> vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, wherewith they minister <S%H8334><s%> unto it:

And they shall put <S%H5414><s%> it and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof within a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> it upon a bar <S%H4132><s%>.

And upon the golden <S%H2091><s%> altar <S%H4196><s%> they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> it with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H7760><s%> to the staves <S%H905><s%> thereof:

And they shall take <S%H3947><s%> all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of ministry <S%H8335><s%>, wherewith they minister <S%H8334><s%> in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and put <S%H5414><s%> them in a cloth <S%H899><s%> of blue <S%H8504><s%>, and cover <S%H3680><s%> them with a covering <S%H4372><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>, and shall put <S%H5414><s%> them on a bar <S%H4132><s%>:
And they shall take away the ashes <S%H1878><s%> from the altar <S%H4196><s%>, and spread <S%H6566><s%> a purple <S%H713><s%> cloth <S%H899><s%> thereon:

And they shall put <S%H5414><s%> upon it all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof, wherewith they minister <S%H8334><s%> about it, even the censers <S%H4289><s%>, the fleshhooks <S%H4207><s%>, and the shovels <S%H3257><s%>, and the basons <S%H4219><s%>, all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the altar <S%H4196><s%>; and they shall spread <S%H6566><s%> upon it a covering <S%H3681><s%> of badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins <S%H5785><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> to the staves <S%H905><s%> of it. basons: or, bowls

And when Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> have made an end <S%H3615><s%> of covering <S%H3680><s%> the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and all the vessels <S%H3627><s%> of the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, as the camp <S%H4264><s%> is to set forward <S%H5265><s%>; after <S%H310><s%> that, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> to bear <S%H5375><s%> it: but they shall not touch <S%H5060><s%> any holy thing <S%H6944><s%>, lest they die <S%H4191><s%>. These things are the burden <S%H4853><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kohath <S%H6955><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>.

And to the office <S%H6486><s%> of Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> pertaineth the oil <S%H8081><s%> for the light <S%H3974><s%>, and the sweet <S%H5561><s%> incense <S%H7004><s%>, and the daily <S%H8548><s%> meat offering <S%H4503><s%>, and the anointing <S%H4888><s%> oil <S%H8081><s%>, and the oversight <S%H6486><s%> of all the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and of all that therein is, in the sanctuary <S%H6944><s%>, and in the vessels <S%H3627><s%> thereof.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto Aaron <S%H175><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Cut ye not off <S%H3772><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%>:

But thus do <S%H6213><s%> unto them, that they may live <S%H2421><s%>, and not die <S%H4191><s%>, when they approach <S%H5066><s%> unto the most <S%H6944><s%> holy things <S%H6944><s%>: Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall go in <S%H935><s%>, and appoint <S%H7760><s%> them every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to his service <S%H5656><s%> and to his burden <S%H4853><s%>:
But they shall not go in <S%H935><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> when the holy things <S%H6944><s%> are covered <S%H1104><s%>, lest they die <S%H4191><s%>.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> unto Moses <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%>,
Take <S%H5375><s%> also the sum <S%H7218><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, throughout the houses <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, by their families <S%H4940><s%>;

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> until fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou number <S%H6485><s%> them; all that enter in <S%H935><s%> to perform <S%H6633><s%> the service <S%H6635><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>. to perform: Heb. to war the warfare
This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%>, to serve <S%H5647><s%>, and for burdens <S%H4853><s%>: burdens: or, carriage

And they shall bear <S%H5375><s%> the curtains <S%H3407><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, his covering <S%H4372><s%>, and the covering <S%H4372><s%> of the badgers' <S%H8476><s%> skins that is above <S%H4605><s%> upon it, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>,

And the hangings <S%H7050><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, and the hanging <S%H4539><s%> for the door <S%H6607><s%> of the gate <S%H8179><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%>, which is by the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> and by the altar <S%H4196><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and their cords <S%H4340><s%>, and all the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of their service <S%H5656><s%>, and all that is made <S%H6213><s%> for them: so shall they serve <S%H5647><s%>.

At the appointment <S%H6310><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> and his sons <S%H1121><s%> shall be all the service <S%H5656><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Gershonites <S%H1649><s%>, in all their burdens <S%H4853><s%>, and in all their service <S%H5656><s%>: and ye shall appoint <S%H6485><s%> unto them in charge <S%H4931><s%> all their burdens <S%H4853><s%>. appointment: Heb. mouth

This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1649><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>: and their charge <S%H4931><s%> shall be under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>.
As for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, thou shalt number <S%H6485><s%> them after their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>;

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> shalt thou number <S%H6485><s%> them, every one that entereth <S%H935><s%> into the service <S%H6635><s%>, to do <S%H5647><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>. service: Heb. warfare

And this is the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden <S%H4853><s%>, according to all their service <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>; the boards <S%H7175><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, and the bars <S%H1280><s%> thereof, and the pillars <S%H5982><s%> thereof, and sockets <S%H134><s%> thereof,

And the pillars <S%H5982><s%> of the court <S%H2691><s%> round about <S%H5439><s%>, and their sockets <S%H134><s%>, and their pins <S%H3489><s%>, and their cords <S%H4340><s%>, with all their instruments <S%H3627><s%>, and with all their service <S%H5656><s%>: and by name <S%H8034><s%> ye shall reckon <S%H6485><s%> the instruments <S%H3627><s%> of the charge <S%H4931><s%> of their burden <S%H4853><s%>.

This is the service <S%H5656><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, according to all their service <S%H5656><s%>, in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, under the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Ithamar <S%H385><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Aaron <S%H175><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%>.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the chief <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation <S%H5712><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%> after their families <S%H4940><s%>, and after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>,

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that entereth <S%H935><s%> into the service <S%H6635><s%>, for the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>:
And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them by their families <S%H4940><s%> were two thousand <S%H505><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

These were they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the Kohathites <S%H6956><s%>, all that might do service <S%H5647><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, which Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did number <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, throughout their families <S%H4940><s%>, and by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>,

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that entereth <S%H935><s%> into the service <S%H6635><s%>, for the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>,

Even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, throughout their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>, were two thousand <S%H505><s%> and six <S%H8337><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and thirty <S%H7970><s%>.

These are they that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gershon <S%H1648><s%>, of all that might do service <S%H5647><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> did number <S%H6485><s%> according to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

And those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, throughout their families <S%H4940><s%>, by the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>,

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that entereth <S%H935><s%> into the service <S%H6635><s%>, for the work <S%H5656><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>,
Even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them after their families <S%H4940><s%>, were three <S%H7969><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and two hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

These be those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Merari <S%H4847><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%> according to the word <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>.

All those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, whom Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron <S%H175><s%> and the chief <S%H5387><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> numbered <S%H6485><s%>, after their families <S%H4940><s%>, and after the house <S%H1004><s%> of their fathers <S%H1><s%>,

From thirty <S%H7970><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward <S%H4605><s%> even unto fifty <S%H2572><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, every one that came <S%H935><s%> to do <S%H5647><s%> the service of the ministry <S%H5656><s%>, and the service <S%H5656><s%> of the burden <S%H4853><s%> in the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation <S%H4150><s%>,
Even those that were numbered <S%H6485><s%> of them, were eight <S%H8083><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fourscore <S%H8084><s%>.

According to the commandment <S%H6310><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> they were numbered <S%H6485><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses <S%H4872><s%>, every <S%H376><s%> one <S%H376><s%> according to his service <S%H5656><s%>, and according to his burden <S%H4853><s%>: thus were they numbered <S%H6485><s%> of him, as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%>.
